sentences.sContent: Planning, as they employ the term, means: plans made by others will prescribe to me what I am to do and how to do it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Planning, as they employ the term, means: plans made by others will prescribe to me what I am to do and how to do it.
sentences.sCn: 按照他们使用这个词的方式，“计划”的意思是指：由他人所制定的计划将规定我应该做什么以及如何做。

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + scrib(写) + e → 预先写好 → 规定； 指示
